A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a long time Star Wars fan and even survived the prequels. However\, this was the movie that caused me to abandon all hope and will be the last I bother seeing in the theater. Insane plot holes\, lots of questionable \"science\,\" terrible plot devices\, awkwardly inserted comedy (like a bad attempt to mimic Marvel)\, bad CGI\, overly long movie that had me checking the time -- I could go on and on. Just as The Force Awakens felt like a reshoot of A New Hope\, this felt like a strange mashup of scenes from The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. With billions of dollars\, why didn't someone at Disney read the story first? The most perplexing thing is that the critics score is > 90%. How did that happen? Or maybe that is where the billions of dollars went....
